public class Charmap
extends java.lang.Object

Implements the character mapping rules defined in the Stringprep and Nameprep rfc documents.

Method Detail

execute

public static int[] execute(int[] input)
                     throws XcodeException
Get all character from the mapping tables in memory
Parameters:
input - an int array
Returns:
int array mapping to the input array
Throws:
XcodeException - if the input array in null or empty or if input characters were mapped out during character mapping
